nodes.excerpt: Mirror iPhone/iPad to your Mac wirelessly. No need to connect iPhone/iPad to Mac with a cable. Demo what's on your iPhone/iPad in online meeting, play games, draw live. PhoneCast is a universal purchase app so you buy once and use it on iPhone, iPad and Mac.
nodes.title: PhoneCast - Mirror iPhone or iPad screen to Mac without wires
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

localize.description: 镜像iPhone/iPad到你的Mac的无线。不需要用电缆将iPhone/iPad连接到Mac上。在在线会议上演示iPhone/iPad上的内容，玩游戏，现场绘画。PhoneCast是一个通用的购买应用程序，所以你购买一次，并在iPhone，iPad和Mac上使用它。
localize.tagline: 将iPhone或iPad屏幕镜像到Mac上，无需接线

localize.description: 鏡像iPhone/iPad到你的Mac的無線。不需要用電纜將iPhone/iPad連接到Mac上。在在線會議上演示iPhone/iPad上的內容，玩遊戲，現場繪畫。PhoneCast是一個通用的購買應用程序，所以你購買一次，並在iPhone，iPad和Mac上使用它。
localize.tagline: 將iPhone或iPad屏幕鏡像到Mac上，無需接線

nodes.excerpt: A connected Notion Workspace, for your Goals, Projects & Tasks, that keeps itself organized, with Smart Notion filters, Formulas & Automations that help prevent "Notion Workspace Bankruptcy."

localize.tagline: 为您的目标、项目和任务提供Notion工作空间。

nodes.excerpt: The Stand & Spin Mat - this new, revolutionary mat allows you to smoothly pivot, swivel, and turn 360° while standing. Made of premium materials and podiatrist approved for active stretching and massaging. Never be bored again at your standing desk!
nodes.title: Fidgity Stand & Spin Mat - Never be bored again at your standing desk
nodes.author: stephen mark

localize.description: 站立与旋转垫--这款全新的、革命性的垫子可以让您在站立时平稳地旋转、旋转和360°旋转。由优质材料和足科医生认可的主动拉伸和按摩。再也不用无聊地站在办公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式办公桌不再无聊

localize.tagline: 拉丁美洲多国薪金经理

nodes.excerpt: The Koan Free tier is a great first step in the journey, making it easy for teams to discover a more transparent, collaborative way of working. Teams in the habit of sharing status, recognizing wins, and heading off concerns early will naturally raise the bar for everyone else around them.
nodes.title: Koan Free Tier - Work with purpose using our OKR and status tracking platform
nodes.author: Matt Tucker

localize.description: Koan免费层是这个旅程中的第一步，让团队很容易发现一种更透明、更协作的工作方式。习惯于分享状态、认可胜利和尽早解决疑虑的团队，自然会提高周围其他人的标准。
localize.tagline: 使用我们的OKR和状态跟踪平台，有目的的工作。

localize.description: Koan免費層是這個旅程中的第一步，讓團隊很容易發現一種更透明、更協作的工作方式。習慣於分享狀態、認可勝利和儘早解決疑慮的團隊，自然會提高周圍其他人的標準。
localize.tagline: 使用我們的OKR和狀態跟蹤平臺，有目的的工作。

nodes.excerpt: Socialize with your coworkers through fun games right in your Slack workspace. It's free while we're in Beta! Games: - Spot the Faker: A game of accusations and deception - Medium Roast: Roast your colleagues (SFW) - Trivia: 50+ categories, 5k+ questions
nodes.title: Bored for Slack - Play social games with your coworkers on Slack
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 在Slack工作空间中通过有趣的游戏与同事进行社交。在我们处于测试版的时候，它是免费的。游戏： - Spot the Faker: 指控和欺骗的游戏 - 中型烤肉。中型烤肉：烤你的同事（SFW） - 琐事：50+类别，5k+问题。
localize.tagline: 在Slack上与同事玩社交游戏

localize.description: 在Slack工作空間中通過有趣的遊戲與同事進行社交。在我們處於測試版的時候，它是免費的。遊戲： - Spot the Faker: 指控和欺騙的遊戲 - 中型烤肉。中型烤肉：烤你的同事（SFW） - 瑣事：50+類別，5k+問題。
localize.tagline: 在Slack上與同事玩社交遊戲

nodes.excerpt: Create and share internal company podcasts to keep employees in tune with what’s important. For example: easily record a weekly update and send it in a push notification, so your team can listen just like their favorite podcasts.

localize.tagline: 为您的团队提供轻松的内部播客

nodes.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
nodes.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer

nodes.excerpt: Onsite.fun is the perfect solution for companies to create and maintain camaraderie when working on a distributed basis. We developed group budgeting, centralized invoicing, recurrent activity bundles, and roles to make it seamless and efficient.

localize.description: Onsite.fun是一个完美的解决方案，当公司在分布式工作时，可以创造和保持友谊。我们开发了团体预算、集中开票、经常性活动捆绑和角色，使其无缝和高效。

nodes.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.
nodes.title: Crikle - Sell more from anywhere
nodes.author: Guillermo Bresciano

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基于网络的销售解决方案，将视频通话与定制化的销售指导和可操作的信息采集相结合，快速销售。减少管理，增加销售。您的团队所需的一切，以更快地转化更多的客户。
localize.tagline: 从任何地方销售更多

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基於網絡的銷售解決方案，將視頻通話與定製化的銷售指導和可操作的信息採集相結合，快速銷售。減少管理，增加銷售。您的團隊所需的一切，以更快地轉化更多的客戶。

nodes.excerpt: Let's build an alternative option for the traditional career & city life. One closer connected to nature, yourself and others. Discover 30+ places around the world where you can live, work and surf with like-minded remote workers. Cuz life is now. Pier🌺️

nodes.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
nodes.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace
nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。
localize.tagline: 管理灵活工作场所的软件

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作場所管理軟件，爲企業提供員工在辦公室或遠程工作的選擇。Worksphere可以自動預約辦公桌，安全輸入，併爲您提供辦公室使用數據，以正確確定工作場所的規模。
localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件

nodes.excerpt: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
nodes.title: Mibo - Videoconferencing that feels like real life
nodes.author: Taco Ekkel

localize.description: Mibo是为非正式会议、远程酒会、社交聚会、网络活动或只是与你的团队一起闲逛而设计的视频聊天软件。在Mibo中，您可以决定加入什么对话和在哪里闲逛。Mibo感觉就像在一起。就像现实生活一样。
localize.tagline: 宛如真实生活的视频会议

localize.description: Mibo是爲非正式會議、遠程酒會、社交聚會、網絡活動或只是與你的團隊一起閒逛而設計的視頻聊天軟件。在Mibo中，您可以決定加入什麼對話和在哪裏閒逛。Mibo感覺就像在一起。就像現實生活一樣。
localize.tagline: 宛如真實生活的視頻會議

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
nodes.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.
nodes.author: Sahil Dave

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移动设备在Figma上查看和添加评论。

localize.description: Figma Comments允許你在手機上直接查看和添加新的評論。您所要做的就是連接您的 Figma 帳戶並選擇您需要的文件。當你的隊友回覆時，你將會在應用程序上看到新的評論，而且是實時的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移動設備在Figma上查看和添加評論。

nodes.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
nodes.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
nodes.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

nodes.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
nodes.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job
nodes.author: Michael Samoylov

localize.description: 如果你想活得更好，活得更长，你就必须进行体育锻炼。西蒙说，这会激励你在白天做简单的锻炼。加入我们与坐姿疾病的斗争吧。
localize.tagline: 桌面作业的活动提醒

localize.tagline: 桌面作業的活動提醒

nodes.excerpt: Hello, would you like to book a call with technology experts? Hacker Noon started a marketplace for on demand video calls with experts in programming, cryptocurrency, ux, remote work, outer space, startups, and futurism.
nodes.title: Tech Expert Video Calls - On demand video calls with hackernoon writers
nodes.author: David Smooke

localize.description: 您好，您想预约技术专家的电话吗？Hacker Noon与编程、加密货币、用户体验、远程工作、外太空、初创企业和未来主义方面的专家建立了一个点播视频通话市场。
localize.tagline: 与黑客中午写手进行点播视频通话

localize.description: 您好，您想預約技術專家的電話嗎？Hacker Noon與編程、加密貨幣、用戶體驗、遠程工作、外太空、初創企業和未來主義方面的專家建立了一個點播視頻通話市場。
localize.tagline: 與黑客中午寫手進行點播視頻通話

nodes.excerpt: Kudos is the easiest way to celebrate wins with your team and align everyone around your core values. Create reward systems and encourage a culture of positive feedback across the company, right from your favorite chat platform.
nodes.title: Kudos by DailyBot - Give positive feedback and align team+culture with Kudos.
nodes.author: Mauricio Morales

localize.description: 表扬是与你的团队一起庆祝胜利，并让每个人都围绕着你的核心价值观取得胜利的最简单的方式。创建奖励系统，鼓励整个公司的积极反馈文化，就在你最喜欢的聊天平台上。
localize.tagline: 给予积极反馈，使团队+文化与Kudos保持一致。

localize.description: 表揚是與你的團隊一起慶祝勝利，並讓每個人都圍繞着你的核心價值觀取得勝利的最簡單的方式。創建獎勵系統，鼓勵整個公司的積極反饋文化，就在你最喜歡的聊天平臺上。
localize.tagline: 給予積極反饋，使團隊+文化與Kudos保持一致。
